annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 1
annotations.translation: 第 1 条

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Scope
annotations.translation: 范围

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. This Regulation shall apply to schemes which constitute State aid within the meaning of Article 87(1) of the Treaty and which provide aid for the creation of employment, provide aid for the recruitment of disadvantaged and disabled workers or provide aid to cover the additional costs of employing disabled workers.
annotations.translation: 1. 本条例适用于构成《条约》第 87(1) 条所指的国家援助的计划，这些计划为创造就业机会提供援助，为招聘弱势和残疾工人提供援助，或为支付雇用残疾工人的额外费用提供援助。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. This Regulation shall apply to aid in all sectors, including the activities relating to the production, processing and marketing of products listed in Annex I to the Treaty.
annotations.translation: 2. 本条例适用于所有行业的援助，包括与《条约》附件一所列产品的生产、加工和销售有关的活动。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: It shall not apply to any aid granted in the coal or shipbuilding sectors, nor to any aid for the creation of employment, within the meaning of Article 4, granted in the transport sector. Such aid shall remain subject to prior notification to the Commission in accordance with Article 88 (3) of the Treaty.
annotations.translation: 该条款不适用于在煤炭、船舶行业提供的任何援助，也不适用于第 4 条所述在交通运输行业提供的创造就业机会的任何援助。根据《条约》第 88(3) 条，此类援助仍须事先通知委员会。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 3. This Regulation shall not apply:
annotations.translation: 3. 本条例不适用于：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) to aid to export-related activities, namely aid directly linked to the quantities exported, to the establishment and operation of a distribution network or to other current expenditure linked to the export activity;
annotations.translation: (a) 对与出口有关的活动的援助，即与出口数量直接相关的援助，对建立和运营分销网络的援助，或对与出口活动相关的其他经常性开支的援助；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) to aid contingent upon the use of domestic in preference to imported goods.
annotations.translation: (b) 以优先使用国内商品而不是进口商品为条件提供援助。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 2
annotations.translation: 第 2 条

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Definitions
annotations.translation: 定义

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: For the purpose of this Regulation:
annotations.translation: 就本条例而言：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) 'aid' means any measure fulfilling all the criteria laid down in Article 87(1) of the Treaty;
annotations.translation: (a) “援助”是指符合《条约》第 87(1) 条的所有标准的任何措施；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) 'small and medium-sized enterprises' means enterprises as defined in Annex I to Regulation (EC) No 70/2001;
annotations.translation: (b) “中小型企业”是指 (EC) 第 70/2001 号条例附件一中定义的企业；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (c) 'gross aid intensity' means the aid amount expressed as a percentage of the relevant costs. All figures used shall be taken before any deduction for direct taxation. Where aid is awarded in a form other than a grant, the aid amount shall be the grant equivalent of the aid. Aid payable in several instalments shall be discounted to its value at the moment of granting. The interest rate to be used for discounting purposes and for calculating the aid amount in a soft loan shall be the reference rate applicable at the time of grant;
annotations.translation: (c) “总援助强度”是指援助金额占相关费用的百分比。所有使用的数字均应在扣除任何直接税之前得出。如援助是以赠款以外的形式提供的，援助金额应与援助的赠款等值。分期支付的援助应折算为发放时的价值。用于贴现和计算软贷款援助金额的利率应为发放时适用的参考利率；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (d) 'net aid intensity' means the discounted aid amount net of tax expressed as a percentage of the relevant costs;
annotations.translation: (d) ”净援助强度“是指扣除税款后的贴现援助额占相关费用的百分比；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (e)  number of employees' means the number of annual working units (AWU), namely the number of persons employed full time in one year, part-time and seasonal work being AWU fractions;
annotations.translation: (e) ”雇员人数“是指年度工作单位 (AWU) 的数量，即一年内全职就业的人数，兼职和季节性工作是 AWU 的分数；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (f) 'disadvantaged worker' means any person who belongs to a category which has difficulty entering the labour market without assistance, namely a person meeting at least one of the following criteria:
annotations.translation: (f) “弱势工人”是指在没有援助的情况下难以进入劳动力市场的一类人，即至少满足以下标准之一的人：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) any person who is under 25 or is within two years after completing full-time education and who has not previously obtained his or her first regular paid employment;
annotations.translation: (1) 年龄在 25 岁以下或完成全日制教育后两年内，且之前未找到第一份固定带薪工作的任何人；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) any migrant worker who moves or has moved within the Community or becomes resident in the Community to take up work;
annotations.translation: (2) 任何为了工作而在共同体内迁移或已经迁移或成为共同体居民的移民工人；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (iii) any person who is a member of an ethnic minority within a Member State and who requires development of his or her linguistic, vocational training or work experience profile to enhance prospects of gaining access to stable employment;
annotations.translation: (3) 任何属于成员国内少数族裔成员且需要发展其语言、职业培训或工作经验以提高获得稳定就业机会的人；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (iv) any person who wishes to enter or to re-enter working life and who has been absent both from work and from education for at least two years, and particularly any person who work on gave up account of the difficulty of reconciling his or her working life and family life;
annotations.translation: (4) 任何希望进入或重新进入职业生涯且已在工作和教育方面至少缺席两年的人，特别是因难以兼顾工作和家庭生活而放弃工作的人；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (v) any person living as a single adult looking after a child or children;
annotations.translation: (5) 任何照顾一个或多个儿童的单身成年人；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (vi) any person who has not attained an upper secondary educational qualification or its equivalent, who does not have a job or who is losing his or her job;
annotations.translation: (6) 任何未取得高中或同等学历、没有工作或即将失业的人；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (vii) any person older than 50, who does not have a job or who is losing his or her job;
annotations.translation: (7) 任何年龄在 50 岁以上、没有工作或即将失业的人；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (viii) any long-term unemployed person, i.e. any person who has been unemployed for 12 of the previous 16 months, or six of the previous eight months in the case of persons under 25;
annotations.translation: (8) 任何长期失业人士，即过去 16 个月中有 12 个月失业的人，或 25 岁以下，在过去八个月中失业六个月的人；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ix) any person recognised to be or to have been an addict in accordance with national law;
annotations.translation: (9) 根据国家法律被认定为是或曾经是有毒瘾的任何人；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (x) any person who has not obtained his or her first regular paid employment since beginning a period of imprisonment or other penal measure;
annotations.translation: (10) 自开始服刑或其他刑事措施开始以来未找到第一份固定带薪工作的人；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (xi) any woman in a NUTS II geographical area where average unemployment has exceeded 100% of the Community average for at least two calendar years and where female unemployment has exceeded 150% of the male unemployment rate in the area concerned for at least two of the past three calendar years;
annotations.translation: (11) 在 NUTS II 地理区域内至少两个自然年的平均失业率超过共同体平均水平的 100％，并且在过去三个自然年中的至少两个自然年中，女性失业率超过相关地区男性失业率 150％ 的任何女性；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (g) 'disabled worker' means any person either:
annotations.translation: (g) “残疾工人”是指以下任何人：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) recognised as disabled under national law; or
annotations.translation: (1) 根据国家法律认定为是残疾人；或

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) having a recognised, serious, physical, mental or psychological impairment;
annotations.translation: (2) 有公认的严重身体、精神或心理缺陷；
